class-validator.is-uuid: Field value must be a UUID
class-validator.is-string: Field value must be a string
class-validator.is-number: Field value must be a number
class-validator.is-email: Field value must a correct email address
class-validator.min-length: Field value needs to be at least {constraints.0} characters
class-validator.max-length: Field value needs to be less than {constraints.0} characters
class-validator.weak-password: Password must contain uppercase characters, lowercase characters and numbers or symbols
class-validator.is-phone-number: Field value must a correct phone number
class-validator.is-mobile-phone: Field value must be a correct mobile phone number
class-validator.is-postal-code: Field value must be a correct postal code
class-validator.is-date: Field value must be a correct date
class-validator.is-in: Field value must be an item from {constraints.0}
class-validator.is-array: Field value must be an array
class-validator.array-min-length: Array min length needs to be at least {constraints.0} element
class-validator.is-boolean: Field value must be a boolean
